name: knowledge-mcp
description: Semantic search over systems engineering standards (IEEE, INCOSE, ISO, NASA). Provides RAG capabilities for grounding specifications in engineering knowledge.

required.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
required.description: OpenAI API key for generating embeddings

optional.name: QDRANT_URL
optional.description: Qdrant Cloud cluster URL (if using Qdrant)

tools.name: knowledge_search
tools.description: Search engineering standards knowledge base for relevant content. Returns chunks with source citations.

tools.name: knowledge_stats
tools.description: Get statistics about the knowledge base collections and document counts.
